overview: Real College Girls Get In On The Action! --- The wait is finally over and you're not going to believe it! Two REAL college girls wanted to get in on the action with Brittney and Trina. It was smoking hot! Taryn and squirting Angela haze a wannabe and then they reward him with a three-way. Lexington Steele bangs Mary Jane, the girls give lots of hand jobs and Carly goes on a double date with two college studs. This is the one they'll be talking about it!
title: College Invasion 7
